title: CyberLink PowerDVD Ultra 15.0.2623.58 Multilingual - CORE
description:
CyberLink PowerDVD Ultra 15.0.2623.58 Multilingual + Keymaker-CORE

With support for all media types including video, audio and photographic content, PowerDVD is your all-purpose entertainment station.
Enjoy media on PC, mobile devices, home networks, from the cloud, and even social networks.
In the NEW PowerDVD 15, enhanced audio-visual quality, extended file format support, improved functionality, refinements to the user interface, and more, enhance a wide range of digital media experiences.

For over 10 years, PowerDVD has been the worldâ€™s top-selling movie player. Each new version from CyberLinkâ€™s design team introduces innovations in entertainment built on years of engineering excellence.

PowerDVD 15 takes your movie experience to new places with playback enhancements and format support additions you wonâ€™t find in any other player.

Next-Gen TrueTheater Smart Enhancements

TrueTheaterÂ® Color
Intelligently analyzes video footage and optimizes hues and vibrancy, creating a true-to-life viewing experience. TrueTheater Color recognizes skin tones in footage and applies only subtle adjustments to these areas in order to achieve improvements while retaining authentic coloring. 

Smart Buffering for Smoother Playback
PowerDVD's intelligent media buffering engine means that you no longer have to deal with stuttery, stop-start video playback especially when you're streaming video from a NAS device. Advanced preloading techniques let PowerDVD analyze and retrieve additional playback data so that your media playback is not interrupted even if the connection to your storage device is degraded. 

Enjoy Ultra HD Video on Your Own Big Screen
With overlay rendering PowerDVD is able to better render video in accordance with the monitor it is being played on. When PowerDVD detects a 4K video file and a 4K monitor, Overlay Mode is automatically engaged to optimize the rendering pipeline and reduce the graphic resource load, delivering smooth, lag-free playback.

Advanced Audio Capabilities

Enjoy bit-perfect high definition audio output thanks to WASAPI Exclusive Mode technology, and intelligent audio device configuration.

Bit-Perfect Lossless Audio Across More Formats
By configuring audio devices to match the source format, PowerDVD is able to provide bit-perfect lossless audio playback for even more audio formats such as ALAC, FLAC, MP3 and WMA. This allows you to enjoy the optimum lossless audio experience for more media, including movies, home video and music discs or soundtracks.

WASAPI Means Interruption Free Audio
PowerDVD is the only movie and media player to support WASAPI Exclusive Mode technology. This allows PowerDVD to have exclusive access to your system's speakers, blocking non-critical system sounds, and eliminate other annoying audio interruptions, letting you sit back and truely savor your audio-visual movie experience.

Rip Audio Directly from Your Favourite Movie Moments
PowerDVDâ€™s new â€œVideo Scene Selectorâ€ feature lets you to select a section of any video to "bookmark", so favorite scenes can be quickly revisited. Additionally, users can rip audio direct from any video file, allowing for songs or entire soundtracks to be saved as MP3 or AAC files.

Cinema Quality Audio for Your Movies

Enjoy a truly immersive movie experience with support for master-quality audio technology from leaders in the digital audio industry - Dolby and DTS.

- Lossless pass-through for Dolby TrueHD and DTS-HD Master Audio
- Support for HDMI 1.4 for multi-channel high definition audio
- Enjoy cinematic soundtracks with 7.1 channel audio
- Expand 2-channel audio to 6.1 channel sound with Dolby Digital EX

Extended Format Support

Enjoy all your media, no matter the format. Now enjoy the latest H.265 playback, and watch Blu-ray or DVD ISO files direct from PowerDVD.

Go disc free with Blu-ray & DVD ISO playbackNEW
PowerDVD 15 now offers convenient direct playback of Blu-ray and DVD ISO files, either directly from the PC or via a network-connected drive. No additional mounting tools are required.

Optimized for H.265/264 Video Playback
New hardware acceleration support for AMD Carrizo, Intel Haswell and NVIDIA Kepler processors enables PowerDVD to share the workload during movie playback between hardware and software components. This leads to reduced power consumption, and as a result, longer battery life, and flawless playback of all H.265 and H.264 video files, without stutter and lag issues. 

Support for an Extensive Range of Formats

PowerDVD supports a wide range of video, audio, and image file formats, meaning that you can play virtually any media you desire.

Supporting the latest in video formats and codecs, as well as offering unparalleled audio format support, PowerDVD 15 stands alone when it comes to providing the most all-around entertainment experience for the home theater or PC/laptop.
